snippet: Tito Vilanova is stepping down as Barcelona’s coach after a recurrence of throat cancer, a month before Lionel Messi and his teammates begin the defense of their Spanish league title.
abstract: Tito Vilanova will step down as coach of Barcelona soccer team, citing recurrence of throat cancer.
lead_paragraph: Tito Vilanova is stepping down as Barcelona’s coach after a recurrence of throat cancer, a month before Lionel Messi and his teammates begin the defense of their Spanish league title.

headline.main: Vilanova Stepping Down as Barcelona’s Coach Because of Cancer
